nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Rain likely and patchy fog. Cloudy, with a low around 31. Northeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.shortForecast: Patchy Fog then Chance Freezing Rain
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and patchy fog before 7am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of rain between 7am and 9am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of freezing rain and a slight chance of rain between 9am and 10am, then a chance of freezing rain and a chance of rain and patchy fog. Cloudy, with a high near 36. North wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.
